name: Michael Reffett
text: Stopped in for a large pizza for a birthday party Friday the 16th .A simple 1 topping large. Was told 20 minutes which was perfect beings I needed Price Chopper..paid exact cash...come back 25 minutes later...my order was never placed...

name: Adam Nichols
text: Now that Pizza Hut has stopped issuing decent coupons, even after submitting reviews (as they used to), Godfather's Express is by far the best pizza (for the price) in Platte City. It is consistently delicious every time we order it! This is our GO-TO pizza place now! üçïüëç

name: Rebecca Sutton
text: Excellent pizza and great customer service!

name: Ken Denning
text: Located in Phillips 66 gas station. Good pizza, Gluten Free crust was good, only in mini size. Allow at least 40 min-1hr for the GF crust pizza, frozen and needed to thaw.  I would ask for extra sauce next time though.  2 minis were just over $8.
